This is the one that CANNOT be right  Perch, yellow 4-3 Bordentown, NJ May, 1865 Dr. C.C. Abbot   If I am right there has only been a handful above 3 let alone 4 and they have all been from the Great Lakes.  This one I have always felt smelled "fishy"  Oh and Walleye has been DQ'ed and now is 22.9 from Greers Ferry Arkansa
Question: What does a 279 lb. Alligator Gar eat for breakfast?    Answer: Muskie!
